profile_summary:
As a versatile Front End Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **React**, **Vue.js**, and **Angular** to build high-performance, user-centric applications. My strong skills in **CSS**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **Bootstrap** enable me to create responsive and visually appealing interfaces, while employing **Design Systems** to ensure consistency across projects. I have a solid foundation in CI/CD processes and automated testing frameworks, including **Playwright**, **Cypress**, and **Jest**, ensuring a seamless development lifecycle. 

Proficient in integrating **REST APIs** and leveraging **Azure** for cloud-based solutions, I have effectively collaborated across teams to deliver compliant applications in line with industry standards. My technical acumen is complemented by my proactive communication and collaboration skills, making me a reliable team player committed to driving project success. In previous roles, I successfully contributed to projects that improved application performance by over 30%, elevating user engagement and satisfaction.
